function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Miscommunication of COVID-19 transmission characteristics leading to public misinformation","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission due to lack of public awareness and self-prevention","Mitigation":"Use clear and accurate language to communicate COVID-19 transmission characteristics, provide ongoing education and updates","Technologies":"Social media monitoring and fact-checking technologies","People":"The public","Owner":"Health authorities and public health communicators"},{"Description":"Failure to acknowledge diverse levels of risk tolerance and perception","Impact":"Ineffective risk communication and varying levels of public understanding and compliance","Mitigation":"Tailor risk messages to different audiences, provide clear and accessible information, consider diverse communication behaviors","Technologies":"Data analytics for audience segmentation and targeted messaging","People":"Various segments of the public with different risk tolerance and perception","Owner":"Public health authorities and risk communication experts"}]}
